title: Account hacked
body:
I believe my account was hacked as I tried to log onto it today and it had switched regions.  I was able to get onto Leagueoflegends.com to change my password as the account in my browser  was still logged on. 

The odd thing about this issue is it says that the region is switched, but on op.gg it still says my regioon is North America as well as on the main 'Na.leagueoflegends.com' website. 

I submitted a ticket about recovering my account, but I'm just curious what is going to show up for them when switching regions back(?). This is a first for me, so I'm just wondering if anyone else has had a similar experience? 

Thank you,
Moneypkers

replies.body: We'll have the resources to help us with determining what happened, so don't worry!  We can look unauthorized access and help, as well as any reparations with transfers or missing content.  I'm glad you were able to regain access, but I also recommend using our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to make sure your info is safe in and outside of league.  We'll look into your specific issue individually!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0EXex2MG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-29T18:55:01.095+0000)
>
> We'll have the resources to help us with determining what happened, so don't worry!  We can look unauthorized access and help, as well as any reparations with transfers or missing content.  I'm glad you were able to regain access, but I also recommend using our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to make sure your info is safe in and outside of league.  We'll look into your specific issue individually!

Perfect, well I definitely appreciate your help. Riot has the best support team ever! :)
